examples.name: FV Logo made using Illustrator
examples.description: This is a logo designed for an entrepreneurship course project with a friend. FV is a custom motorcycle garage and lifestyle brand selling accessories.

examples.name: Python Sound Splitter
examples.description: To create sound clips of Danish words for Anki cards, I used a small Python script which splits longer sound clips and then arranges the results in folders named like the files they were splitting.

examples.name: This CV
examples.description: This CV is built using a Node JS server, Express, Express-Handlebars for templating, and a multi-language module called i18n.

examples.name: The HikeExchange
examples.description: This website was built for a website creation course in a group of three. It is a website built to share hiking routes. It is built on Node JS, with Express, Handlebars for templating and a Mongo DB database. I worked mainly on the back-end, everything related to the server and database.

examples.name: Analysis of Worst Performing Cards on Anki using R and SQL
examples.description: Anki is a SSR tool (spaced repetition) used to create and learn multimedia flashcards. I used R and SQL to query Anki's SQLite database and find which cards were performing worst to better understand which cards were poorly made or learned.

examples.name: Python Sound Splitter
examples.description: To create sound clips of Danish words for Anki cards, I used a small Python script which splits longer sound clips and then arranges the results in folders named like the files they were splitting.
